                              爆料

                          <span class="line"></span>
                          <p>
                              <span class="num">109207</span>
                              粉丝
                          </p>
                      </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="btn-group">

        <div class="tab_info comment-main" id="commentTabBlockHot">
            <ul class="comment-main-list">
                <!-- .comment-main-list-item 为完整的一条一级评论 -->
                <!-- data-comment-id 评论id -->

                    <!-- 头像区域 -->
                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-avatar">
                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/6763546192/pinglun" target="_blank">
                            <!-- 用户头像 -->
                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-avatar-head" src="https://avatarimg.smzdm.com/default/6763546192/644780fd5b4459735-small.jpg" alt="">
                            <!-- 头像挂件 -->
                                                        <!-- V标识 -->
                                                    </a>
                    </div>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>

                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">

                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="143304714">

                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给xiaoha"></textarea>
                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->

                                    <div class="comment_smileBox">

                                        <div class="smileLayerBg" id="smiley" style="display: none;"></div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>看到必中两个字就知道这是瞎掰。任何活动细则绝不会出现这种字眼以免产生纠纷。</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->

                                <li class="comment-main-list-item" data-exposure="0" data-smzdm-id="6743426543" data-comment-id="342142393" data-comment-info="{&quot;is_visible&quot;: 0, &quot;action_top&quot;: 2, &quot;is_top&quot;: 0}">

                            <!-- 用户头像 -->
                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-avatar-head" src="https://avatarimg.smzdm.com/default/6743426543/66326024b13d45752-small.jpg" alt="">

                    </div>
                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <div class="list-item-level1">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->

<!-- <div class="bind-mobile pop-container" style="z-index: 9999">
    <div class="mobile-pop-content J_pop_content">
        <div class="J_mobile_close">
            <a href="javascript:;" class="icon-times-o mobile_close"></a>
        </div>
        <div class="mobile-login J_mobile_loggin">
            <div class="mobile-title">绑定手机号码</div>

                <div class="mobile-input">
